/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is lined with lush green trees that add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different colors and models are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's vibrant life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the busy street scene.
